summary:
Nexus is your ticket to a decentralized ecosystem that fuels AI advancements. - Join the Nexus of AI innovation today.

 Why Choose Us? - A few reasons why you should choose Nexus.

 Benefits of Holding - The Benefits of Nexus Coin are tailored to meet your specific investment goals and aspirations.

 AI Funding Catalyst - Nexus Coin serves as a catalyst for AI funding, empowering innovative start-ups in the field of AI.

 Profit-sharing Opportunities - As a Nexus Coin holder, you have the potential to benefit from profit-sharing opportunities.

 Governance and Decision-making - Nexus Coin provides you with the ability to actively participate in the governance and decision-making processes.

 Access to Exclusive Investments - By holding Nexus Coin, you gain access to exclusive investment opportunities within the AI industry.

 Enhanced Security and Transparency - Nexus Coin prioritizes security and transparency.

 Community Collaboration - Join a vibrant and engaged community of like-minded individuals passionate about AI.

 What we plan on doing in the future (Our Roadmap) - Building the Future of AI in Phases

 Phase 1 - Public Sale, Launch on Pancakeswap, CG & CMC Listing, AINX2 Trending, AINX2 Holders Prize Event

 Phase 2 - Start-Up Funding Application Opens, First Start-Up Funding, Partnerships, V2 Website Launch, CEX Listings, Staking

 Phase 3 - Profit from Successful Start-Ups Reinvested into AINX2, T1 Exchange Listings, Platinum Holders Chat - Exclusive, Nexus Newsletters

 Funding the World. - Nexus Funding AI Advancements Over the World.

 Total Funding Provided So Far - $378,124.74

 Businesses Funded - 32
proposal:
Greetings Nexus community! 🖖

I see you're all about that AI innovation life, and I must say, it's quite impressive how you're fueling advancements in the field. You're like the Tony Stark of the crypto world, except instead of building suits, you're building futures. (And hopefully not attracting any super villains!) 

We've noticed that Nexus Coin serves as a catalyst for AI funding and has already provided a whopping $378,124.74 in funding to 32 businesses. That's some serious coin! 💰

Our B2B tool shop might just have the perfect tools to help you continue this trajectory. Imagine creating your own DEX based on Uniswap V2 or a blockchain-based lottery. All with customizable features and zero to minimal commission. 

And let's not forget about the multicurrency crypto wallet, staking & yield farming, governance for your crypto token, and a blockchain bridge. Each tool is designed to support the growth of communities like yours. 

And the best part? It's all B2B, so you're not just playing, you're creating. 

So, how about it? Ready to take Nexus to the next level? Check out our demos at https://t.me/onoutdemos and let us know! 👋

PS: If Tony Stark were here, he'd probably say, "I love it. 3000." But hey, no pressure. 😉
